instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: Thanks to the commitment of our 181,207 employees and distributors, we increased revenues to € 102.6 billion and improved operating profit by 5.1% to € 10,915 million.

output: Thanks to the commitment of our 181,207 employees and distributors, we increased revenues to € 102.6 billion and improved operating profit by 5.1% to € 10,915 million.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: From 2002 to 2007 we selectively invested around € 3 billion in developing growth markets such as India, China and Russia.

output: Inmitten dieser Umwälzungen steigerten wir in den Jahren 2002 bis 2007 die Anzahl unserer direkten Kunden von rund 64 auf 80 Millionen.

input: By 2011 we want to expand our customer base to around 100 million.

input: As far as our strategy is concerned, the focus for 2008 is definitely on implementation.

input: – The various sales formats (including direct sales, banking agencies, specialist representatives and brokers) in all major markets will be adopted to new customer requirements as well as competitive patterns and regulatory changes.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: Michael Diekmann, Chairman of the Board of Management During the entire reporting year, the Supervisory Board ob- served the duties incumbent upon it in accordance with the law and the Statutes.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: In Supervisory Board meetings, on the basis of reporting from the Board of Management, we discussed in detail the development of the business and important decisions and business matters.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The Supervisory Board met in total six times during the 2007 financial year.
output: Im Geschäftsjahr 2007 trat der Aufsichtsrat insgesamt zu sechs Sitzungen zusammen.

input: Im Geschäftsjahr 2007 trat der Aufsichtsrat insgesamt zu sechs Sitzungen zusammen.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The Supervisory Board also met on two further occasions: in January 2007 it held an extraordinary meeting in relation to the offers to acquire the minority interest in AGF and Allianz Lebensver- sicherungs-AG.
output: Darüber hinaus tagte der Aufsichtsrat zwei weitere Male: Im Januar 2007 trat er zu einer außerordentlichen Sitzung im Zusammenhang mit den Angeboten zum Erwerb der Minderheitenanteile an AGF und der Allianz Lebensversi- cherungs-AG zusammen.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.

output: The Supervisory Board also met on two further occasions: in January 2007 it held an extraordinary meeting in relation to the offers to acquire the minority interest in AGF and Allianz Lebensver- sicherungs-AG.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: There was also a constitutive meeting fol- lowing fresh election of the Supervisory Board by the 2007 ordinary General Meeting.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.

Booth takes responsibility for the NAFTA markets, in addition to his current responsi- bilities.

Booth über seine bisherigen Aufgaben hinaus auch die Verantwortung für die NAFTA-Märkte wahr- nimmt.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The Errors resulted primarily from the accounting for the purchase of Dresdner Bank in 2001 and 2002, consolidation of special funds in 2001 and other errors related to minority interest and policyholder participation occurred in combination with mergers.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The Super- visory Board Risk Committee of Allianz SE meets on a regular and ad-hoc basis to monitor the risk profile of the Allianz Group based on risk reports presented by the Chief Financial Officer and Chairman of the Group Risk Committee.
output: Das Risk Committee des Aufsichtsrats der Allianz SE tritt regelmäßig und auch spontan zusammen, um das Risikoprofil der Allianz Gruppe anhand von Risikoberichten zu überwachen, die der Chief Financial Officer und der Chairman des Group Risk Com- mittee vorlegen.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Das Risk Committee des Aufsichtsrats der Allianz SE tritt regelmäßig und auch spontan zusammen, um das Risikoprofil der Allianz Gruppe anhand von Risikoberichten zu überwachen, die der Chief Financial Officer und der Chairman des Group Risk Com- mittee vorlegen.
output: The Super- visory Board Risk Committee of Allianz SE meets on a regular and ad-hoc basis to monitor the risk profile of the Allianz Group based on risk reports presented by the Chief Financial Officer and Chairman of the Group Risk Committee.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: Furthermore, it is re- sponsible for recommending and coordinating measures to mitigate risk.
output: Außerdem empfiehlt und koordiniert es Maßnahmen zur Risikominderung.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Außerdem empfiehlt und koordiniert es Maßnahmen zur Risikominderung.
output: Furthermore, it is re- sponsible for recommending and coordinating measures to mitigate risk.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The Group Risk department (“Group Risk”), which reports to the Chief Financial Officer, develops methods and processes for identifying, assessing and monitoring risks across the Allianz Group based on systematic qualitative and quanti- tative analysis and regularly informs management concern- ing the Allianz Group’s risk profile.
output: Die Abteilung Group Risk, die an den Chief Financial Officer berichtet, entwickelt Methoden und Prozesse, die geeignet sind, Risiken gruppenweit zu identifizieren, zu bewerten und zu überwachen, und zwar auf der Grundlage einer systema- tischen qualitativen und quantitativen Analyse.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Die Abteilung Group Risk, die an den Chief Financial Officer berichtet, entwickelt Methoden und Prozesse, die geeignet sind, Risiken gruppenweit zu identifizieren, zu bewerten und zu überwachen, und zwar auf der Grundlage einer systema- tischen qualitativen und quantitativen Analyse.
output: The Group Risk department (“Group Risk”), which reports to the Chief Financial Officer, develops methods and processes for identifying, assessing and monitoring risks across the Allianz Group based on systematic qualitative and quanti- tative analysis and regularly informs management concern- ing the Allianz Group’s risk profile.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The core elements of the risk framework are set forth in the Group Risk Policy, which has been approved by the Board of Management of Allianz SE and which defines the minimum requirements for all oper- ating entities within the Allianz Group.
output: Die Group Risk Policy, die vom Vorstand der Allianz SE genehmigt wurde, enthält die Hauptelemente des Risiko- rahmens und schreibt Mindestanforderungen für alle ope- rativen Einheiten fest.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Die Group Risk Policy, die vom Vorstand der Allianz SE genehmigt wurde, enthält die Hauptelemente des Risiko- rahmens und schreibt Mindestanforderungen für alle ope- rativen Einheiten fest.
output: The core elements of the risk framework are set forth in the Group Risk Policy, which has been approved by the Board of Management of Allianz SE and which defines the minimum requirements for all oper- ating entities within the Allianz Group.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: Additional risk stan- dards, such as standards related to specific segments or risk categories, are in place for our operating entities world- wide.
output: Für unsere weltweiten operativen Einheiten gibt es zusätzliche Risikostandards, die sich unter anderem auf spezifische Geschäftssegmente oder Risiko- kategorien beziehen.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Für unsere weltweiten operativen Einheiten gibt es zusätzliche Risikostandards, die sich unter anderem auf spezifische Geschäftssegmente oder Risiko- kategorien beziehen.
output: Additional risk stan- dards, such as standards related to specific segments or risk categories, are in place for our operating entities world- wide.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The risk governance structure is further complemented by Group Audit, Group Compliance and Legal Services functions.
output: Unsere Risk-Governance-Struktur wird überdies durch die Abteilungen Group Audit, Group Compliance und Group Legal Services ergänzt.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Unsere Risk-Governance-Struktur wird überdies durch die Abteilungen Group Audit, Group Compliance und Group Legal Services ergänzt.
output: The risk governance structure is further complemented by Group Audit, Group Compliance and Legal Services functions.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: In addition, the Allianz Climate Core Group is a panel of internal experts that examines the possible effects of climate change on our business developing risk manage- ment strategies and identifying potential opportunities resulting from climate change.
output: Außerdem untersucht die Allianz Climate Core Group, ein internes Expertengremium, inwieweit Klimaänderungen möglicherweise unser Geschäft beeinflussen, entwickelt darauf abgestimmte Risikomanagementstrategien und identifiziert Geschäftschancen, die sich aus der Klimaände- rung für die Allianz ergeben.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Außerdem untersucht die Allianz Climate Core Group, ein internes Expertengremium, inwieweit Klimaänderungen möglicherweise unser Geschäft beeinflussen, entwickelt darauf abgestimmte Risikomanagementstrategien und identifiziert Geschäftschancen, die sich aus der Klimaände- rung für die Allianz ergeben.
output: In addition, the Allianz Climate Core Group is a panel of internal experts that examines the possible effects of climate change on our business developing risk manage- ment strategies and identifying potential opportunities resulting from climate change.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: Our internal risk capital model considers both concentra- tion and correlation when aggregating results on the Allianz Group level, in order to reflect that not all of our potential losses are likely to be realized at the same time.
output: Wenn unser internes Risikokapitalmodell Ergebnisse grup- penweit zusammenfasst, berücksichtigt es Korrelation und Konzentration, denen zufolge potenzielle Verluste wahr- scheinlich nicht alle gleichzeitig entstehen.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Wenn unser internes Risikokapitalmodell Ergebnisse grup- penweit zusammenfasst, berücksichtigt es Korrelation und Konzentration, denen zufolge potenzielle Verluste wahr- scheinlich nicht alle gleichzeitig entstehen.
output: Our internal risk capital model considers both concentra- tion and correlation when aggregating results on the Allianz Group level, in order to reflect that not all of our potential losses are likely to be realized at the same time.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: Where possible, we develop correlation parameters for each pair of risks through statistical analysis of historical data.
output: Wo immer möglich, entwickeln wir Korrelationsparameter für jedes Risikopaar, indem wir historische Daten statistisch analysieren.

input: Wo immer möglich, entwickeln wir Korrelationsparameter für jedes Risikopaar, indem wir historische Daten statistisch analysieren.
output: Where possible, we develop correlation parameters for each pair of risks through statistical analysis of historical data.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: 3) Although the internal risk capital requirements for the Asset Management segment only reflect business risk, the evaluation of market risk and credit risk on the account of third parties is an integral part of the risk management process of our local operating entities.

input: 3) Obgleich die Anforderungen bezüglich des internen Risikokapitals an das Segment Asset Management nur das Geschäftsrisiko widerspiegeln, ist die Bewertung des Markt- und Kreditrisikos bei Kapitalanlagen für Dritte ein integraler Bestandteil des Risikomanagementprozesses unserer lokalen operativen Einheiten.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: Reputational risk is the risk of direct loss or loss in future business caused by a decline in the reputation of the Allianz Group or one or more of its specific operating entities from the perspective of its stakeholders – shareholders, custom- ers, staff, business partners or the general public.
output: Das Reputationsrisiko ist das Risiko eines direkten Verlustes oder eines Verlustes an zukünftigem Geschäftsvorlumen, das aus einem Ansehensverlust der Allianz Gruppe insge- samt oder einer oder mehrerer ihrer Gesellschaften bei Anspruchsberechtigten, Aktionären, Kunden, Mitarbeitern, Geschäftspartnern oder der Öffentlichkeit erwächst.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: On April 27, 2007 the French stock market authority, the Autorité des Marchés Financiers (“AMF”) announced, that following the closing of the tender offer for the outstanding shares of AGF, Allianz SE (directly and indirectly through its subsidiary Allianz Holding France SAS) held 178,030,698 AGF shares representing 92.18 % of AGF’s share capital and voting rights.
output: April 2007 kündigte die französische Finanzmarktauf- sicht Autorité des Marchés Financiers (AMF) an, dass nach Abschluss des Übernahmeangebots für die restlichen AGF- Aktien die Allianz SE (direkt und indirekt über ihre Tochter- gesellschaft Allianz Holding France SAS) 178 030 698 AGF- Aktien hielt, die 92,18 Prozent des Aktienkapitals und der Stimmrechte der AGF entsprechen.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The Board of Management is authorized to exclude share- holders’ subscription rights with the consent of the Su- pervisory Board for fractional amounts, for safeguarding the rights pertaining to holders of convertible bonds or bonds with warrants, and in the event of a cash capital increase by up to 10%, if the issue price of the new shares is not significantly less than the stock market price.

output: The Board of Management is authorized to exclude share- holders’ subscription rights with the consent of the Su- pervisory Board for fractional amounts, for safeguarding the rights pertaining to holders of convertible bonds or bonds with warrants, and in the event of a cash capital increase by up to 10%, if the issue price of the new shares is not significantly less than the stock market price.

input: The re- vised version of IFRS 3 and the amended version of IAS 27 include the following changes: – The scope of IFRS 3 has been extended and applies now also to combinations of mutual entities and to combina- tions achieved by contract alone.
output: Die Überarbeitung von IFRS 3 und die Ände- rung von IAS 27 enthalten folgende Änderungen: – Der Anwendungsbereich von IFRS 3 wurde erweitert und ist nun auch für Zusammenschlüsse von Gegenseitig- keitsunternehmen und für Zusammenschlüsse, die rein vertraglich erfolgen, anzuwenden.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.

output: Changes in the presentation of the consolidated financial statements The Allianz Group has identified certain prior period errors through an analysis of various balance sheet accounts (the “Errors”).

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.
input: The Errors resulted primarily from the following issues: – Accounting for the purchase of Dresdner Bank in 2001 and 2002, which included realized gains and losses on invest- ments which did not reflect the correct purchase price allocation for the Dresdner Bank opening balance sheet.
output: Die Fehler resultieren im Wesentlichen aus den folgenden Sachverhalten: – Bilanzierung des Kaufs der Dresdner Bank in den Jahren 2001 und 2002, einschließlich der realisierten Gewinne und Verluste aus Finanzanlagen, welche die Kaufpreisallo- kation in der Eröffnungsbilanz der Dresdner Bank nicht korrekt abbilden.

instruction: Translate the following German financial text to English with formal accuracy.
input: Die Fehler resultieren im Wesentlichen aus den folgenden Sachverhalten: – Bilanzierung des Kaufs der Dresdner Bank in den Jahren 2001 und 2002, einschließlich der realisierten Gewinne und Verluste aus Finanzanlagen, welche die Kaufpreisallo- kation in der Eröffnungsbilanz der Dresdner Bank nicht korrekt abbilden.
output: The Errors resulted primarily from the following issues: – Accounting for the purchase of Dresdner Bank in 2001 and 2002, which included realized gains and losses on invest- ments which did not reflect the correct purchase price allocation for the Dresdner Bank opening balance sheet.

output: – Other errors, related to the accounting for minority inter- ests and reserves for premium refunds, occurred in com- bination with mergers.

input: Additionally, many of the Allianz Group’s traditional contracts issued in France and Italy do not incorporate significant insurance risk, although they are accounted for as insurance contracts, because of their discretionary par- ticipation features.

instruction: Translate the following English financial text to German with formal accuracy.

output: The Declaration of Compliance of the two publicly traded group companies Allianz Lebensversicherungs-Aktienge- sellschaft and Oldenburgische Landesbank AG were issued in December 2007, respectively, and were made permanently available to the shareholders.
